Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 75th/Stony Island
ShortDescription: Westbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, South Chicago and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/Stony Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Westbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, South Chicago, 75th and over regular route, due to street blockage near 75th/Stony Island.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cicero/Sunnyside
ShortDescription: NB #54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd. buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Montrose, Milwaukee, Lawrence & Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/Sunnyside

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd. buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Montrose, Milwaukee, Lawrence, then resume their normal route on Cicero.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near Cicero/Sunnyside.

Headline: Blue Line Trains Resume Stopping at Cicero/Congress Station
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running with significant delays and have resumed making stops at Cicero/Congress after earlier police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with significant delays and have resumed making stops at Cicero/Congress after earlier police activity.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

  • #54 Cicero buses

As a result of the delay, shuttle buses will continue to provide connecting service between Pulaski/Congress to Austin/Congress, in both directions, and will conclude at 12:25 a.m.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
